query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS alert_notification_preferences (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  email_enabled BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE,
  email_address VARCHAR(320),
  sms_enabled BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
  phone_number VARCHAR(20),
  receive_info BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
  receive_warning BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE,
  receive_critical BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE,
  quiet_hours_enabled BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
  quiet_hours_start INT,
  quiet_hours_end INT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HwZw1vuDqLodBY.root --database hjcHA4SjAwhM6aP28vcAkH --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS alert_notification_preferences (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  email_enabled BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE,
  email_address VARCHAR(320),
  sms_enabled BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
  phone_number VARCHAR(20),
  receive_info BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
  receive_warning BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE,
  receive_critical BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE,
  quiet_hours_enabled BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
  quiet_hours_start INT,
  quiet_hours_end INT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
